title: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly (2002) [En/Multi] (1.0) Repack by Ma2
description:
Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly (2002/Multi6/Repack by Ma2012ks) PC Game

Language: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian-only menu.

Version: 1.0.0.0


Description:

Brave dragon Spyro is back!

Dragons Celebrate the Year of the Dragon Festival and are willing to give their dragons hatched dragonfly, but out of nowhere, there is a magician Ripto. The aim is to capture all the villain dragonflies without which the dragons are absolutely defenseless. But he is wrong with the spell and dragonflies fly around the World of Dragons ...

Spyro will have to return all the dragonflies and, once and for all, put an end to Ripto and his minions.


Features:

- The game begins shortly after Spyro 3: Year of the Dragon.
- Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the country of Dragons.
- In Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly awaits twelve differing levels with their respective enemies of varying degrees of duplicity.
- A huge number of various mini-games, where will fly even on a flying saucer.
- Nice graphics with stunning detail, as well as fun gameplay and good music - leave no one indifferent.

Features of Release:

Game settings - as in the full version of PC
Additional software (DirectX, Microsoft Visual C + + Redist 32/64 bit)
Bilingual installer (English/Russian) with Original Game Soundtrack and Slideshow
Installation of 5-7 minutes
It is recommended to read the Readme file


Minimum configuration:
CPU SSE2 2.4 GHz, RAM 1 Gb
VRAM 256 Mb, DirectX 9.0c, Shader Model 2.0
HDD 1.7 Gb

Microsoft Windows Se7en / Vista / XP

Installing and running

Installation:

1. Mount the disk image in Daemon Tools or similar supporting mount a virtual drive disk image format iso. 
2. Install the game, following the instructions of the program-setup. 
3. Play! 

Start:

At the start of the menu ("Press START") - press Enter, to enter the game
On OS: Windows Vista / Seven game desirable to run as administrator

! Release tailored just for playing the keyboard and mouse, you can customize them to your taste in "Manage."

  To play gamepad fit a simple program JoyToKey or Xpadder
